== Introduction ==
The Coding Strike Force, or CSF, is purposed to contribute code to the <nowiki>[[UbuntuMediaCenterTeam|Ubuntu Media Center]]</nowiki> project. The primary areas of activity include work on <nowiki>[[http://elisa.fluendo.com/|Elisa]]</nowiki>, HAL, and LIRC.

== Current Activities ==
* <nowiki>[[MediaCenter/RemoteSupport|Remote Control Support]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[MediaCenter/CodecSupport|Codec Support]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[MediaCenter/UISpecs|User Interface Specification]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[MediaCenter/SoftwareSpecs|Software Specification]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[MediaCenter/CodingStrikeForce/UMCConfigurationPlugin|UMC configuration Plugin]]</nowiki>
